document.full_text: security forces loyal to ivory coast's laurent gbagbo launched an assault on saturday to drive fighters backing his rival for the presidency out of a suburb of abidjan, military officials said.
document.title: pro-gbagbo ivorian forces launch assault in abidjan
lines_and_colors: security forces loyal to ivory coast's laurent gbagbo launched an assault on saturday to drive fighters backing his rival for the presidency out of a suburb of abidjan, military officials said.
